law.catch_line: Highest discount to apply for use of two or more antitheft devices.
law.text: If two (2) or more antitheft devices listed in KRS 304.20-410 to 304.20-430 are attached to a motor vehicle, the total discounts shall be that applicable to the device which meets standards for the highest discount.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 352, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1986.
